.. _io.tbtrans:

TBtrans
=======

.. module:: sisl.io.tbtrans

.. autosummary::
   :toctree: generated/

   tbtncSileTBtrans
   deltancSileTBtrans

   tbtsencSileTBtrans
   tbtavncSileTBtrans
   tbtprojncSileTBtrans


PHtrans
=======

`TBtrans`_ is per default a ballistic electron transport utility. It may also
be compiled in a ballistic phonon transport mode, named ``PHtrans``.

.. autosummary::
   :toctree: generated/

   phtncSilePHtrans
   phtsencSilePHtrans
   phtavncSilePHtrans
   phtprojncSilePHtrans
